No offence, but I am kind of surprised people would ask others for games through the net. I can totally understand asking family and friends, but random people on the net? Just is kinda weird. It would be like me going up to a random classmate in college and asking them to buy something for me for no reason. XD

But hey, if people are really this nice, go for it I guess. I, myself, would just never think of trying something like this. But my moral standards are pretty high compared to most. I never ask anything of anyone unless I plan to give them back something in return or if we are really good friends.
Steam Gifts and Steam Trade websites already exist. Perhaps that's a better place to go to start?

True, but I don't trust those.

Anyway, why not here, all the people I (sort of) know are here....
